repnme.cdata!: El Salvador - Structural Adjustment Loan Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The loan will support the
            government's structural adjustment program, which is
            designed to: (a) improve incentives to stimulate savings and
            investment in more efficient export oriented and
            import-substituting activities; (b) increase tax enforcement
            capacity; (c) improve the efficiency of financial
            intermediation; (d) improve productivity in the agricultural
            sector; and (e) prevent a deterioration in the nutritional
            status of the poor during the adjustment process.
